title: Engaging Philosophy as a Christian
description: Jared Oliphint sits down with Dr. K. Scott Oliphint to speak about how Christians should approach the subject of philosophy. They speak about the necessity of the Christian position, the questions asked and answers offered by secular philosophers, and the worldviews communicated in popular culture. Participants: Jared Oliphint, K. Scott Oliphint
